name: Combat Radar
author: LazyWizard
description:
**Requires LazyLib**

This mod adds a simple radar to the combat layer of Starsector. This radar includes an extensible plugin system, allowing other mods to add custom element rendering with (relative) ease.

You can find the files to configure the radar in data/config/radar/

Please note that this mod deliberately uses the incredibly outdated OpenGL 1.x immediate mode to match core Starsector and should not be used as a guideline for working with OpenGL elsewhere. Use shaders, people!
